result.arabic_text: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي صَدَقَنَا وَعۡدَهُۥ وَأَوۡرَثَنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ حَيۡثُ نَشَآءُۖ فَنِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ
result.translation: 74. Waxayna odhan: Ammaan idilkeed iyo mahad waxaa leh Allaah, ee nooga dhabeeyey Ballan qaadkiisa, nana dhaxal siiyey dhulka (Jannada). Waxaan ka degnaa Jannada meeshaan doonno, ee fiicanaa abaalgudka kuwa camal san fashay.
